name: LWM - Len'en Fangame with Mechs
description:
LWM is a Len'en fangame with a focus on mech combat based on the Super Robot Wars games.

Current Features:
-A demo consisting of 6 stages!
-Original mech designs made by me!
-A bazaar where you can buy mechs!
-A dozen or so cheaply put-together songs!
-Copy-pasted enemies!
-In-jokes you probably won't understand!
All in one package that appeals to absolutely nobody!

Note: Feedback is appreciated. I have no idea what I'm doing.
